text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to state that a Luxembourg inter-company loan could be considered a defensible financing structure. The candidate answer discusses the implications of inter-company debt from the U.S. parent (triggering Section 956 inclusion) and inter-company debt from an Irish sister subsidiary (avoiding Section 956 but creating other complexities).
